content: I'm having some issues with my bathroom sink - the drain has been slowing down, and I've had to use a plunger a few times to get it to drain properly. Can you suggest a good drain cleaner product that can help clear out any clogs? By the way, I'm pretty diligent about maintaining my bathroom, and I restocked on toilet paper around the same time as replacing the toilet brush, so I'm hoping it's not a bigger issue.
